paper_abstract: The Tiling Slideshow system automatically organizes consumer photos and provides a novel audiovisual presentation. Displaying at the same pace as user-selected music, photos are elaborately manipulated and displayed to mold a novel browsing experience. In contrast to conventional photo slideshows, the proposed presentation provides tighter audiovisual coordination, and offers a more lively viewing experience.
paper_title: Tiling slideshow: An audiovisual presentation method for consumer photos
